author: Indoda Yamaqiniso
message: It looks like 99% of the people at the management of Eskom are white and Indian; all foreigners on our land. It's all talk with less documented evidence here "It's Eskom More jails and even more money to keep them in jail. You must be special kind of stupid. do you know how much does it cost the state to run prison settlements? Sending a person to prison for stealing money is a stupid thing to do as you will pump more money to maintain him/her. I bet that's why we chose not to send Apartheid criminals to prison. "I do not mean anything You can turn to eNCA While the family rejoices that the killer of Reeva Steenkamp goes to prison and justice is being served; the reality says the killer is being rehabilitated with state money. Just a typical example right there. ...if you're smart "Corruption is strife with white people "Black diss one of their own together with whites and when it's a white person in the limelight How is the truth racist? "Hence I didn't say ""all white"" people are corrupt. I said corruption is rife amongst white people and they protect each other no matter what "This thing of being loyal to other whites If you tell them today that Apartheid was the most corrupt system they'd deny it.
